availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Civil Appointments, 1859-1862

body.p:
ROBERT C. WRIGHT,
Notary Public & Commissioner of Deeds
FOR THE FOLLOWING STATES:
Wisconsin, Missouri, Kentucky, Ohio, Minnesota, Michigan, Connecticut, Iowa, Indiana, New York, N. Hampshire, Pennsylvania, Rhode Island, Kansas, Massachusetts, Nebraska, Vermont, Maine, New Jersey.

R. C. WRIGHT, JNO. A. TYRRELL.
☞ Time Loans negotiated and First Class Business Paper bought and sold.
P. O. Box 6049.

Late decisions which have been rendered in the supreme courts of several of the States make it imperative that the name of the State for which the commissioner of deeds is acting should be fully stated in the body of the seal.
As the impression from my seal was wanting in this particular, the same has been altered to meet the late decisions, and I now enclose you an impression of the same, to place on file in your office

To Secretary of State
Frankfort Ky.

Illinois
Impression of seal
Filed Apr 5 1862
Robt. C. Wright
